pages.title: Copper
pages.text: Mining Level: Iron (2) $(br2)Mining Speed: 4.2 $(br2)Base Durability: 125 $(br2)Durability Multiplier: 0.8 $(br2)Attack Damage: +1.5

pages.title: Traits
pages.text: $(7)Magnetic II: $()$(br)Holding the tool pulls nearby items. $(br2)$(4)Corroding: $()$(br)The tool loses a small amount of durability with each repair.
